summary: Provides utilities and a manager for handling ANSYS MAPDL licensing, including locating license files, determining the license utility path, and monitoring the license debug log for errors or server connectivity issues. The core class controls the lifecycle of license checks, interacts with external license utilities, and raises appropriate errors when the license server is unreachable.
business_intent: Enable reliable verification of ANSYS MAPDL license availability and server status, ensuring that users have valid licensing before running simulations and facilitating automated handling of license-related failures.
